name: Orbita (Rock Angel)
description:
CONTROLS:

Press a letter on the keyboard to gravitate towards the corresponding letter. 

BACKSPACE to return to menu

TAB to reset the level

SPACE to continue to the next level

Use the power of gravity to maneuver yourself around space, discover the best paths and try to get the best times on each level.

This is a quick and simple game I made simply mostly for my own sake and to practice audio production, spritework, CG art, and simple coding. It was made in Gamemaker Studio 2 and honestly could use more polish but I'm just tired of working on it. 

This game DOES NOT SAVE YOUR LEVEL RECORDS ONCE YOU END THE TAB because I couldn't figure out how to save data for web using GMS2 and honestly just don't have the patience to work on it anymore. All levels are available in the level select from the start.
